meta.desc-meteoriks: Nominarrrrgh ye Winnarrrrrrgh Executarrrrr Grarrrrgggg Meteoarrrr !!!!.

meteoriks.what-are-meteoriks-p1: The Meteoarrrr!!!! Ye couldn't find the pointy end of yer sword, ye gutless, lily-livered whelp! ... Yo ho ho an' a bottle o' rum!
meteoriks.what-are-meteoriks-p2: I'll send ye to Davy Jones, ye bilge-drinkin', scabby cur! ... Ahoy!
meteoriks.juror-application-open: Me parrot has a smaller nose than ye, ye mangy, bilge-drinkin' halfwit! ... Arrrrgh!! {{current-year}} Meteoarrrr!!!! Arrrr!!
meteoriks.public-nominations-open: I'll dance the hornpipe o'er yer grave, ye pestilent, yellow-bellied mongrel! ... Blimey! {{current-year}} Meteoarrrr!!!! Ye're as smart as a barrel of bilge, ye rum-thievin', ghastly scalawag! ... Hoist the Jolly Roger! Pouët arrr Demozoo.

about.what-is-exegfx-p1: I'll gut ye bow to stern, ye daft, lice-infested parrot! ... Blistering barnacles!
about.what-is-exegfx-p2: Ye couldn't hit water if ye fell out of a boat, ye spineless, bilge-drinkin' sea bass! ... Land ho!
about.what-is-exegfx-p3: Ye're toothless, chum-smellin' blaggart! ... Blast ye!
about.what-is-exe-dot-gfx-p1: Ye're the worst pirate I ever seen, ye pox-faced, poxy idiot! ... Yarr!
about.what-is-exe-dot-gfx-p2: I'll eat yer parrot an' drink yer rum, ye dreadful, pestilent blowfish! ... Shiver me timbers!
about.credit-curator: This collection is curarrrrgh by yx.
